original_text: They led him first to Annas, who was the father of Caiaphas's wife. Caiaphas was the leader of the priests that year.
korean_text: 먼저 안나스에게로 끌고 가니 안나스는 그 해의 대제사장인 가야바의 장인이라

sentences.original_text: They led him first to Annas
who was the father of Caiaphas's wife
Caiaphas was the leader of the priests
